summary: I'm a motivated individual with strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Seeking to join a fast-paced, innovation-driven tech company where I can apply my knowledge of Java, cloud platforms, and Al to build scalable and impactful software solutions

responsibilities: Collaborate with a team to design and maintain efficient Java applications across the SDLC.
Write clean, scalable code and participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Designed and evaluated prompts for AI models to generate accurate and efficient code solutions.
Tuned and optimized model responses by analyzing performance and iterating prompt strategies
Developed Python-based software and managed applications hosted on Azure.
Collaborated in cross-functional teams, strengthening communication, teamwork, and empathy.
Analyzed data using Power BI, improving data-driven decision-making and reporting.

projects.name: Waste Management Application
projects.description: Developed a waste sorting mobile application for Enviro365, aimed at promoting sustainable waste management practices by providing users with waste category lookup, disposal guidelines, and recycling tips. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Spring Boot to enable seamless communication between the frontend and backend systems, ensuring efficient data retrieval and manipulation.

projects.name: IELTS TUTOR - International English Language Testing System
projects.description: Built a real-time IELTS speaking simulator using Python, Azure Speech Services, and OpenAl, providing users with feedback through a conversational interface. Implemented data processing and reporting features using Streamlit, pandas, and matplotlib.

projects.name: Flexiculture E-commerce Website
projects.description: Developed a fully responsive e-commerce platform for FlexiCulture, a streetwear clothing brand, using modern web technologies. The website features secure checkout, product catalog management, and user-friendly navigation to enhance customer experience and streamline online sales. Delivered a scalable, visually compelling solution aligned with the brand's identity.

certifications.name: Oracle Certified Associate Java SE 8 Programmer - 1Z0-808

achievements: Junior Chamber International (JCI Sandton) Mentee (Mar 2025 - Present)
Geekulcha Annual Hackathon #GKHack24 - Recognized for innovation and impact (Oct 2024)
Nedbank Innovators of Tomorrow Hackathon Winner (Feb 2024)
